short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows digital currency rates on new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension opens a New Tab with currency value of your favorite CrytoCurrencies / Coins. 

Select your favorite Coins and conversion currency to display. It fetches live update from CoinMarketCap when opening a New Tab. Useful for a quick update on the Digital Currency world. Lightweight extension to increase your investment productivity.

** THIS EXTENSION DOES NOT TRACK YOUR ACTIVITY **

Changelog v0.0.4 :-
 - New Settings Page
 - Select your favorite coins
 - Select your conversion currency (USD, EUR, INR, etc.)

Upcoming releases :-
 - More themes
 - More features (please send your suggestions)

If you have any doubts, feature request, bugs or just want to grab a beer, feel free to ping me.
